modName: More realistic creature stats and abilities
summary: Changes almost all the creatures in skyrims stats to be more realistic .
descriptionHtml:
Info : I have taken the time to edit most creatures stats and abilities to something more realistic . I have left out vampires , dragons , and werewolves as to avoid clashes with mods that make changes to them . Changed the Abilities related to them . If you have any problems let me know as i just made this mod today it should work 100% fine but i have not tested it much .

List of changes (long) :I changed alot of stats and added some in so i will just tell you what they are set to now not what they use to be. You will notice on some i added some damage health effects as i felt they had to much health when others did not have enough . I will not list effects that most will not under stand but be assured i did not get rid of any script commands that are only set to certain creatures those are still there i just wont be listing them . so to start ...... 
Bear snow - Resist frost 50 (same) , fortify unarmed damage 50(added) , fortify stamina 100 (added).  
Chaurus- resist damage 50 (was 100 ) , resist poison 50 (same) .     
Dragon priest - Resist poison 100 (same) , damage health 30 (added ) .   
Draugr - resist poison 100 (same)  , removed frost resist , Changed draugr magic  weakness magic constant 33 and removed resist frost .
Dwarven automatons - Resist poison 100 (same) , fortify health 25(new) , resist damage 5 (new) removed resist frost and magic. 
Dwarven centurion - Resist poison 100(new) , Fortify Health 40(new).
Dwarven Sphere - Fortify stamina 30(new) , resist poison 100 (new).
Dwarven spider -resist poison 100 (new)
Falmer - Blind 20(was 80) , Fortify sneak  5 (was 30), Damage health 30 (new) .
Flame Atronach - Resist fire 100 (same) , Weakness frost constant 60 (was 33 )  , Atronach fire cloak 30 (was 10) .
Frost Atronach  - Resist frost 100 (same) , Weakness fire constant 50(was 33) , Atronach frost cloak 30 (was 10) , fortify health 40(new).
Frostbite Spider giant snow - Resist frost 50 (same) , Fortify unarmed damage 60 (was 10) , resist poison 100 (new) . 
Frostbite spider large snow - Resist frost 50(same) , Fortify unarmed damage 40(was 10 ) , Fortify stamina 40 (new) .
Frostbite Spider Snow - Resist frost 25 (was 50) , Fortify unarmed damage 20(new) .
Horker- Resist frost 50 (same).
Horse - Fortify heal rate combat 1(was 0.5) , Fortify stamina 300(new)  .
ice wraith -Resist frost 100(same) , Weakness to fire constant 50(was 25) , Atronach frost cloak 50 (new) .
Mammoth- resist frost 33(same) , Fortify health 50(new) , fortify stamina 100(new) . 
Mudcrab - Fortify health 20(new) .
sabere cat snow - resist frost 50(same) , fortify unarmed damage 50(new)
Shadowmere - Fortify heal rate combat 4 (same), fortify heal rate 4(same) , Fortify stamina 300(new) , Fortify stamina rate 4 (new) .
Skeleton- Resist poison 100(same) , Resist shock 50(new) removed resist frost.
Spriggan - Weakness fire constant 50(was 33) , resist poison 100(new).
Spriggan matron - Weakness fire constant 15(was 33) , fortify health 50(new) , resist poison 100(new) . 
Storm Atronach - Resist shock 100(same) , atronach shock cloak 50(was 10) , fortify health 50(new) .
Troll - Weakness fire constant 60(was 50) , Fortify heal rate combat  0.8(was 0.5) , fortify melee damage 20(new).
Frost Troll - Resist frost 50(was 33) , Weakness fire constant 60(was 50) , Fortify unarmed 30(new) 
Wisp - Fortify heal rate combat .5(was .25) , Fortify health 50(new) .
Ice wolf - Resist frost 10(was 50) , Fortify unarmed damage 30(was 15) .

Install: Place esp into your data folder and active it either in your skyrim launcher data files or nexus mod manager.

I apologize for any mistakes in spelling or values this took me awhile to look up the two values and their changes . If you have any ideas or suggestions to improve this mod let me know . Also if you notice any problems or values not working please let me know so i can try to get it sorted out as i said i have not tested this mod but it should work great . Please comment and if you enjoy the mod and endorsement is always nice thanks and enjoy ! 

Updates ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

1/1/2012- Added an update to falmer changing the blind effect from 20 to 90 for a more realistic approach for those who want it .
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
author: Legend Xz
